dict.acceptation: 学校，学院；学业；学派；学科；
训练，锻炼；教育，教导；约束；给…上学；

sent.orig: I used to run in high school.
sent.trans: 好了，现在我们看一看怎么样把 He used to swim in high school. 变成问句。

sent.orig: In the second part, the paper uses Black-School option price formula to calculate loans price.
sent.trans: 文章的第二部分利用Black—School期权定价公式，计算贷款的定价问题。

sent.orig: Girls 2outperform boys in 3elementary school, middle school, high school and college and graduate school.
sent.trans: 在小学、初中、高中、大学以及研究生院，女生的成绩都比男生优秀。

sent.orig: In China it, seven junior high school students must attend school, only five school.
sent.trans: 而在中国呢，初中生七点便要上学，五点才会放学。

sent.orig: According to school's regulations, all students should wear school badges when they are at school.
sent.trans: 学校规定：学生在校期间都要佩戴校徽。
